differences.gitbook: Daniela Alves, guillermolucero, Martin Rivero, SergioBenaR
differences.supabase: Daniela Alves, Guillermo, Martin Rivero, Sergio

differences.gitbook: Recent challenges, such as Solana’s Copa America, were discussed and the team’s efforts were acknowledged. Guillermo emphasised the value of diversity of capabilities within the group, while Daniela Alves proposed modifications to the organisation of tasks to optimise team performance. The importance of improving communication and organisation was underlined, as was the need for all members to actively contribute. Sergio highlighted the need to establish a clearer structure for teamwork, in order to facilitate the achievement of long-term objectives. Martin Rivero reflected on his experience in the team, pointing out the need for open communication and clear organisation in order to contribute effectively. A system for recording individual contributions was proposed and outstanding issues from the previous quarter were addressed, emphasising the importance of continued commitment by all.
differences.supabase: Recent challenges, such as Solana’s Copa America, were discussed and the team’s efforts were acknowledged. Guillermo emphasised the value of diversity of capabilities within the group, while Daniela Alves proposed modifications to the organisation of tasks to optimise team performance. The importance of improving communication and organisation was underlined, as was the need for all members to actively contribute. Sergio Benavides highlighted the need to establish a clearer structure for teamwork, in order to facilitate the achievement of long-term objectives. Martin Rivero reflected on his experience in the team, pointing out the need for open communication and clear organisation in order to contribute effectively. A system for recording individual contributions was proposed and outstanding issues from the previous quarter were addressed, emphasising the importance of continued commitment by all.

differences.gitbook: It was decided to implement a contribution tracking sheet for each member of the team. This sheet must be filled out every 15 days to stay up to date with all tasks and payments.
differences.supabase: It was decided to implement a contribution tracking sheet for each member of the ambassador team. This sheet must be filled out every 15 days to stay up to date with all tasks and payments.

differences.gitbook: Round 5 of DeepFunding is approaching. The LatAm Town Hall will be held on Thursday, November 7th and will be presented by Martín and Sergio. The callout for the hackathon organized by DeepFunding will be included, and the RFP related to OpenCog Hyperon that is currently in effect will also be mentioned.
differences.supabase: The official call for round 5 of Deep Funding is approaching. The Town Hall will be held on Thursday, November 7th and will be presented by Martín and Sergio. The call for the Hackathon organized by Deep Funding will be included and the RFP related to Opencog Hyperon that is currently in effect will also be mentioned.
